title: Sweet and sticky malva pudding
ingredients: ['Pudding', '30g unsalted butter', '1 teaspoon vinegar', '125ml milk', '200g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '1 tablespoon apricot jam', '190g cake flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 pinch salt', 'Sauce', '250ml double cream', '115g unsalted butter', '100g caster sugar', '125ml water, orange juice or sherry']
